page.title: 06Government. Barbridge.
page.content: Although only a sparsely populated area this survey covers parts of 10 different Parishes served by 7 Parish Councils and 1 Parish Meeting.The Parishes are - Aston-juxta-Mondrum, Brindley,Burland,Cholmondeston, Haughton,Henhull,Hurleston,Poole,Stoke and Wardle.35 Parish Councillors represent these Parishes. Listed below are details of all representatives of Government for this area from Borough to European level. Crewe and Nantwich Borough Council - 2 members representing Acton and Minshull Wards. Cheshire County Council - 1 member representing Cholmondeley Ward. Crewe and Nantwich Parliamentary Constituency - 1 Member of Parliament. European Parliament - 1 Member repres- enting Cheshire East Constituency.
